text: Saeed Fathi Rowshan (born 17 September, 1980, in Tehran) is an Iranian television host, illusionist, and mentalist. He was one of the finalists in the first season of the television talent show Asre Jadid. In 2021, the Cognitive Sciences and Technologies Development Headquarters, a subsidiary of the Vice-Presidency for Science and Technology of Iran, appointed Saeid Fathi Roshan as the â€œAmbassador of Brain and Cognition. == Tv Show == *Emarat *Sim Akhar *Bazimoon ==References== == External Links == *
title: Saeed Fathi Rowshan
